Package com.flipkart.dao

Class FlipFitCustomerDAO

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.FlipFitCustomerDAO
public class FlipFitCustomerDAO extends Object
The FlipFitCustomerDAO class provides the implementation for the data access layer responsible for performing database operations related to customer functionalities. These include registering customers, viewing available gym centers, viewing available gym slots, booking gym slots, and viewing customer bookings.

This class interacts with the database using SQL queries defined in the FlipFitConstants class.

  • Method Details

    • registerCustomer

      public void registerCustomer(FlipFitCustomer customer) throws SQLException
      Registers a new customer in the system.
      Parameters:
      customer - The FlipFitCustomer object containing the customer's details to be registered.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs during registration.

    • viewGymList

      public List<FlipFitGymCentre> viewGymList() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all approved gym centers.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitGymCentre objects representing the approved gym centers.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs during retrieval.

    • viewAvailableSlots

      public List<FlipFitSlot> viewAvailableSlots(int gymId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of available slots for a specific gym.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym for which the available slots are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitSlot objects representing the available slots for the specified gym.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs during retrieval.

    • bookGymSlot

      public int bookGymSlot(int customerId, int slotId) throws SQLException
      Books a gym slot for a customer and creates a corresponding payment transaction. The method performs the following steps atomically:
      1. Creates a booking entry in the database.
      2. Decrements the available seats for the slot.
      3. Creates a payment entry in the database with status 'Completed'.
      If any of these steps fail, the transaction is rolled back.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer booking the slot.
      slotId - The ID of the slot being booked.
      Returns:
      The transaction ID associated with the booking.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs during the booking process.

    • viewMyBookings

      public List<FlipFitBooking> viewMyBookings(int customerId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of bookings made by a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer whose bookings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitBooking objects representing the customer's bookings.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs during retrieval.
